message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and relevance to you, worth $1200000 to you personally. I am extending this offer to you at a special price of $1100000, which represents a significant saving compared to its full value. I believe this is an attractive proposition that would allow you to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer or if you require any additional information to make your decision.
